::Amperion::
    "Argh!  You claim to understand me!  You are pathetic!  You know nothing! 
 I care not for your wishes.  I will not let you past me if only to spite 
you.  If you were really knew why I act this way you would know better than 
to yell at me and order me around now draw your weapons and fight or leave!"
